flawed_nl_solution:
The number of truck stamps is 11 + 9 = <<11+9=20>>20.
The number of rose stamps is 20 − 13 = <<20-13=7>>7.
Bella bought 11 + 20 + 7 = <<11+20+7=83>>83 stamps in all.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 38, not 83. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
